channel.title: Castle Cashers
channel.description:
I was wondering if anyone has ever played lol?
Console- Xbox - You can obtain Castle Crashers in the marketplace for 1200msp. It is the most button smashing game I have ever played. There are a few addons.

item.title: Castle Cashers
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:11, topic:441383”][quote author=nolan2131 link=topic=544076.msg3988677#msg3988677 date=1336272421]

It’s great. What add-ons are there?

The King and Necromancer Pack. They give you more characters to play with.
[/quote]gay

I no u r but wut am i

I haven’t seen that comeback since the 3rd grade…

It’s a shame this isn’t on ps3, watched a vid on youtube seemed cool.
(inb4 fucking console war from immature assholes)[/quote]

Yeah it would be cool on ps3 as well. Although I only use my ps3 for movies, Resident Evil, and Jack and Daxter. I have had it for about 2 years and only have purchased 2 games.

Read full topic

item.title: Castle Cashers
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Speljohan:

The best local co-op game on Xbox 360 by far. It’s a shame local co-op is a dying breed, that’s where i use consoles the most.

That used to be so fun on the original Xbox, to sit there and play Star Wars Battlefront with my friend :rolleyes:
I wish it would stay, but it’s not showing any signs of it

Read full topic
